downloadDescription: Get a 25% discount on Microsoft Dynamics CRM Online Enterprise. Activate your Customer Service and Marketing users with Microsoft Dynamics CRM Online Enterprise for a 360oview of your customer relationships.
detailsSection:
Offerterms and conditions:
•25% discount on Dynamics CRM Online Enterprise license.
•No discount on Professional, Basic, or Essential USLs, and subscription add-ons.
•No discount onDynamics Marketing Enterprise or Parature Enterprise standalone USLs.
•This promotion is available under the following licensing programs on the price list: Microsoft Direct Online Services, Microsoft Products and Services Agreement and Microsoft Enterprise Agreement.
•This promotion cannot be combined with any other discount on Dynamics CRM Online Enterprise.
•Eligible EA and MPSA customers must contact their Microsoft Representative to request this promotion
